column4: Can anyone familiar with preseeding tell me why I get prompted to confirm lvm partitioning when using http://pastebin.com/9czQPpVL on 12.04?
Guess I'll try asking a different question :).. Anyone using preseeding to do fully automated installs with 12.04?
Mind sharing your partitioning scheme? I've looked everywhere online and they swear "d-i partman/confirm_nooverwrite boolean true" should fix my problem, but it doesn't.
